mapper.select: SELECT user.*, role.title AS role_title FROM upms_user user LEFT JOIN upms_user_role ur ON user.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN upms_role role ON role.role_id = ur.role_id

SELECT uur.user_id, uur.username, cur.realname, cur.avatar, uur.email, uur.create_time FROM upms_user uur LEFT JOIN cms_user cur ON uur.user_id = cur.fk_upms_user_id LEFT JOIN upms_user_role uure ON uur.user_id = uure.user_id WHERE uure.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT uur.user_id, uur.username, cur.realname, cur.avatar, uur.email, uur.create_time FROM upms_user uur LEFT JOIN cms_user cur ON uur.user_id = cur.fk_upms_user_id LEFT JOIN upms_user_organization uuon ON uur.user_id = uuon.user_id WHERE uuon.organization_id = #{organizationId}
